entry.title: Aggravated autumn depression
entry.summary: I've felt miserable for a month, at least. Here is the explanation...

div.p: The last few weeks I've not felt as good as I used to. As a matter of fact I've been really miserable.

It started in August. You see, when I was about to complete any substantial piece of work or project, I looked forward to the delivery with certain level of separation anxiety. And then, after all deliverables were completed and a new service was in place, I got a postpartum depression.
This autumn all this was aggravated by severe nicotine withdrawal symptoms. I'd say, don't even try giving up wet snuff, unless you've prepared yourself for a passage through hell.
